mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goods_unit WHERE id=#{id} AND tenant_id=${tenantId} AND is_deleted=0
SELECT count(1) FROM goods g WHERE g.is_deleted=0 AND g.tenant_id=${tenantId} AND g.goods_unit_id=#{id}
mapper.update:
update goods_unit
unit_code = #{unitCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_at = #{lastUpdateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
local_id = #{localId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goods_unit WHERE tenant_id = ${tenantId} AND is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 0, 1
SELECT * FROM goods_unit WHERE tenant_id=${tenantId} AND is_deleted=0 AND unit_name=#{unitName}
select id, unit_name from goods_unit where tenant_id = #{tenantId} and is_deleted = 0
